data.name: Goosebumps Night of Scares
data.description:
***GOOSEBUMPS’ GREATEST MONSTERS COME TO LIFE! WILL YOU SURVIVE?***

Featuring Jack Black as R.L. Stine, just as in the all-new Goosebumps movie.

The bestselling horror series comes to life on mobile for the first time and features Goosebumps most frightening monsters,  including Slappy the Dummy, evil gnomes, werewolves, and more.  Can you survive a night in R.L. Stine’s house - a living trap filled with his most famous monsters? Mystery, madness, and frightening moments await!

*** READ THE BOOKS. SEE THE MOVIE. PLAY THE GAME!***

Goosebumps TM Scholastic. Movie © 2016 CPII. Game code © 2016 Cosmic Forces, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

translations.long_description:
***구스범스 최강의 괴물이 나타났어요! 살아남을 수 있을까요?***
잭 블랙의 RL 스타인 목소리 연기
베스트셀러 호러 시리즈가 사상 처음으로 모바일로 제공되며 꼭두각시 슬래피, 악의 요정 인형, 늑대인간 등 구스범스에서 가장 무서운 괴물들을 선보입니다. 유명한 괴물들로 가득한 R.L. 스타인의 집에서 하룻밤 동안 살아남을 수 있을까요? 미스터리, 광기, 공포의 순간들이 기다립니다!

*** 책을 읽으세요. 영화를 보세요. 게임을 플레이하세요!***

Goosebumps TM Scholastic. Movie © 2016 CPII. Game code © 2016 Cosmic Forces, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
translations.short_description: ***GOOSEBUMPS’ GREATEST MONSTERS COME TO LIFE! WILL YOU SURVIVE?***

translations.long_description:
***グースバンプスのこわ～いモンスターたちが命を吹き込まれた！君は生き残れるかな？ ***
R.L.スタインの声は新作映画版と同様、ジャック・ブラックが担当。
全世界でベストセラーとなっているホラーシリーズが、初めてモバイルで命を吹き込まれた。グースバンプスの中でも特に恐ろしい、スラッピーやノーム、狼男などなどが登場。有名なモンスターたちがひしめき合う、作者R.L.スタインの家で一夜を生き延びることが君にできるかな？謎と狂気、そして恐怖のモンスターたちがそこに待ち受けている！

*** 本を読んで、映画を見よう。そしてゲームをプレイしよう！***

Goosebumps TM Scholastic. Movie © 2016 CPII. Game code © 2016 Cosmic Forces, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
translations.short_description: ***GOOSEBUMPS’ GREATEST MONSTERS COME TO LIFE! WILL YOU SURVIVE?***

translations.long_description:
***I MIGLIORI MOSTRI DI PICCOLI BRIVIDI PRENDONO VITA! RIUSCIRAI A SOPRAVVIVERE?***
Jack Black presta la voce a R. L. Stine, proprio come nel nuovissimo film di Piccoli brividi.
Questa serie horror di grande successo prende vita per la prima volta su dispositivi mobili. Presenta i mostri più spaventosi di Piccoli brividi, tra cui il pupazzo Slappy, gli gnomi diabolici, i lupi mannari e altri. Riuscirai a sopravvivere una notte nella casa di R. L. Stine, una trappola vivente popolata dai suoi mostri più famosi? Mistero, follia e momenti spaventosi ti aspettano!

*** LEGGI I LIBRI. GUARDA IL FILM. GODITI IL GIOCO! ***

Goosebumps TM Scholastic. Movie © 2016 CPII. Game code © 2016 Cosmic Forces, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
translations.short_description: ***GOOSEBUMPS’ GREATEST MONSTERS COME TO LIFE! WILL YOU SURVIVE?***

translations.long_description:
***LES PLUS GRANDS MONSTRES DE CHAIR DE POULE PRENNENT VIE ! SURVIVREZ-VOUS?***
Avec Jack Black dans le rôle de R.L. Stine, tout comme dans le tout nouveau film Chair de poule.
La franchise d’horreur la plus populaire prend vie pour la première fois sur mobile et met en scène les monstres les plus effrayants de Chair de poule, notamment Slappy le pantin, des nains maléfiques, des loups-garous et bien plus encore. Survivrez-vous toute une nuit dans la maison de R.L. Stine – un piège vivant peuplé de ses monstres les plus célèbres ? Mystère, folie et moments terrifiants vous attendent !

*** LISEZ LES LIVRES. REGARDEZ LE FILM. JOUEZ AU JEU !***

Goosebumps TM Scholastic. Movie © 2016 CPII. Game code © 2016 Cosmic Forces, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
translations.short_description: ***GOOSEBUMPS’ GREATEST MONSTERS COME TO LIFE! WILL YOU SURVIVE?***

translations.long_description:
***¡LOS MAYORES MONSTRUOS DE PESADILLAS COBRAN VIDA! ¿LOGRARÁS SOBREVIVIR?***
Jack Black le pone la voz a R. L. Stine, exactamente igual que en la nueva película de Pesadillas.
¡La exitosa franquicia de terror se estrena en móviles! Y lo hace con los monstruos más terroríficos de Pesadillas, tales como el muñeco Slappy, gnomos malvados, hombres lobo y mucho más. ¿Lograrás sobrevivir a una noche en casa de R. L. Stine? ¿Te atreverás a encerrarte con sus monstruos más famosos? ¡En este juego te encontrarás misterios, locura y momentos verdaderamente terroríficos!

*** LEE LOS LIBROS. VE A VER LA PELÍCULA. ¡JUEGA AL JUEGO!***

Goosebumps TM Scholastic. Movie © 2016 CPII. Game code © 2016 Cosmic Forces, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
translations.short_description: ***GOOSEBUMPS’ GREATEST MONSTERS COME TO LIFE! WILL YOU SURVIVE?***

translations.long_description:
***DIE SCHRECKLICHSTEN MONSTER VON GÄNSEHAUT ERWACHEN ZUM LEBEN! SCHLOTTERST DU SCHON?***
Mit Jack Black als R.L. Stine, genau wie in dem brandneuen Gänsehaut-Kinofilm.
Die erfolgreichste Horrorserie erwacht zum ersten Mal auf mobilen Geräten zum Leben mit den schrecklichsten Monstern, die Gänsehaut zu bieten hat, darunter Slappy die Bauchrednerpuppe, böse Gnome, Werwölfe und viele weitere. Überstehst du eine Nacht in R.L. Stines Haus - einer gruseligen Falle, angefüllt mit seinen berühmtesten Monstern? Geheimnisse, Wahnsinn und Schockmomente erwarten dich!

***LIES DIE BÜCHER. SIEH DEN FILM. SPIEL DAS SPIEL!***

Goosebumps TM Scholastic. Movie © 2016 CPII. Game code © 2016 Cosmic Forces, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
translations.short_description: ***GOOSEBUMPS’ GREATEST MONSTERS COME TO LIFE! WILL YOU SURVIVE?***
